installCommand: npm install && mkdir -p src/components && cp -f src/components/login.jsx src/components/Login.jsx && cp -f src/components/signup.jsx src/components/Signup.jsx && touch src/CareersPage.jsx && touch src/BenefitsPage.jsx && touch src/IntegrationsPage.jsx && touch src/DocumentationPage.jsx && touch src/PrivacyPage.jsx && touch src/TermsPage.jsx
